name: eFront
author: Epignosis LLC

sections.description:
eFront is a powerful Learning and Talent Development Platform that improves the skills of your people and the competitiveness of your business. It can help you accelerate employee learning & development, ensure compliance training and deliver all the critical training your sector requires. eFront is an effective way of engaging your workforce and achieving organizational goals. Trusted by hundreds of companies and organizations around the world, eFront is the best way to make your talent thrive!

Read more about eFront in:

  • eFront
  • eFront – Blog
  • eFront – Knowledge Base
sections.installation:
1. Download eFrontPro WordPress plugin
  2. Unzip the file into a folder on your hard drive
  3. Upload /efrontpro/ folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ folder on your site
  4. Visit your WordPress Administration -> Plugins and activate eFrontPro WordPress plugin
sections.faq: If you have a question or any feedback you want to share send us an email at support@efrontlearning.com

short_description: This plugin integrates eFront with Wordpress. Promote your eFront content through your WordPress site.
